AttackHelicopterCargoPlaneSettings.name: heli.call
AttackHelicopterCargoPlaneSettings.description: Summons the Attack Helicopter to roam the map, if the event is active.

AttackHelicopterCargoPlaneSettings.name: heli.calltome
AttackHelicopterCargoPlaneSettings.description: Calls the Attack Helicopter to patrol the area around the player who entered the command.

AttackHelicopterCargoPlaneSettings.name: heli.drop
AttackHelicopterCargoPlaneSettings.description: Spawn an Attack Helicopter at a specified player’s location.

AttackHelicopterCargoPlaneSettings.name: heli.dropatplayer
AttackHelicopterCargoPlaneSettings.description: Alias for heli.drop command, functioning the same by spawning an Attack Helicopter at a specified player’s location.

AttackHelicopterCargoPlaneSettings.name: dropcrate.heli_setdropzone
AttackHelicopterCargoPlaneSettings.description: Sets the next Chinook Code Locked Crate drop zone to be at the specified monument.

AttackHelicopterCargoPlaneSettings.name: supply.call
AttackHelicopterCargoPlaneSettings.description: Calls the cargo plane - and will choose a random drop location.

AttackHelicopterCargoPlaneSettings.name: supply.drop
AttackHelicopterCargoPlaneSettings.description: Calls the cargo plane and will drop a supply crate at the player's position.
